description: "When I'm stressed-out I find that running is very therapeutic for me. I can't really function without it," the 26-year-old archer Greyson says, smiling confidently and adding, "it definitely increases my sex drive." Athletic with a perfectly toned body, Greyson has had experiences with both men and women, identifying as a bisexual. "I'm more of a bottom than anything else," he's quick to admit. "The first guy I met, I met him online." The jock smiles, recollecting, "I started off by giving him a blowjob then we went straight into anal, me being the one getting fucked. So, my first anal experience? It was fantastic."
title: Greyson
